name: office-add-in-migrate-vsto-to-web
title: Use a shared library to migrate your VSTO add-in to an Office web add-in
shortDescription: Use a shared library to migrate your Visual Studio Tools for Office add-in to an Office web add-in.
longDescription: Visual Studio Tools for Office (VSTO) add-ins can only run in Office for Windows. By migrating your code to an Office web add-in, you can expand the reach of your add-in to mobile and online platforms. Migrating the code will require it to use the Office JavaScript APIs. However, you can reduce migration cost by creating a shared library and keeping some of your existing add-in code in its current language.

thumbnails.alt: Sharing code between a VSTO Add-in and an Office Web Add-in.

references.name: Tutorial: Share code between both a VSTO Add-in and an Office Add-in with a shared code library
references.description: Tutorial on how to share code between a VSTO Add-in and an Office Add-in.
